name: MAGICAL
description:
A flying eye tells you that you can be a Magical Girl? Well, let's go with it! 

"What do I desire?" is the question that our protagonist asks herself while battling her own emotions inside her "dream"! 

Expression vs Emotion! Defeat the Undefined entities using your Expressions!

Get to the end of this game made with RPGMAKERMV for the MagicalGirlJam#2 and find out what she truly desires!...or will do...or the eye is....or idk. This girl has issues.

Pls don't kill the Shark.

Tfw 

== How to Play == 

Please double click on Game.exe

To move around:

Use the arrow keys

To accept or confirm an action/command: 

Press the Z key

To cancel an action/command or exit the menu: 

Press the X key

To open the menu: 

Press the X key

To dash: 

Hold the SHIFT key

More questions? Ask the statue.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

Special Thanks to Loutsuki, Javalion and SoloL for balance stuff and Ideas for the Bosses and enemies! 

All sprites and illustrations were made during the duration of the Jam except the tiles (From RPGMAKERMV).

Warning!

Pixelart Blood. Not so happy thoughts.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Feedback highly appreciated!
